profileAlternative.name: Gerald Britton
profileAlternative.headline: SQL Server Specialist, Pythonista
profileAlternative.summary:
I am an innovative, results-oriented business intelligence specialist focused on mining critical information from a company's operational and support databases and delivering timely results to the operation's internal customers.

PROFESSIONAL SQL SERVER DEVELOPER: I dive into a company's data warehouse using state-of-the-art SQL Server queries then build efficient, comprehensive stored procedures to ensure correct, on-time results while minimizing server processing requirements. Skilled in SSIS and SSRS.

EXPERIENCED .NET DEVELOPER: I use the .NET applications stack as the glue to bind SQL Server query results to MS-Office documents for delivery to the customer. I leverage ASP.NET to build robust applications to deliver superior customer management. High-quality software in C#, VB.NET and F# (coming!)

OBJECT-ORIENTED FOCUS: Whatever I build, I build it to for robustness and extensibility, using best-practice object-oriented principles.

SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT LIFE CYCLE: I follow SDLC practices to enable consistent management of the software for each BI project.

CONTACT ME: gerald.britton@gmail.com, 647-293-1453

positions.title: Director
positions.description:
* Discover critical business information through data mapping and mining
* Build databases as foundation for business intelligence reporting
* Create efficient, flexible, parameter-driven SQL Stored Procedures
* Deliver timely reporting using .NET, SSIS, SSRS, Excel
* Build robust, extensible solutions
* Follow SDLC best practices
* Python developer and instructor
…
see more

positions.title: Senior Developer
positions.description:
* Enabled more efficient customer service by extending mission-critical intranet applications using ASP.NET, C# and SQL Server
* Delivered timely, program-performance reporting using SSRS

positions.title: Business System Analyst (Contract)
positions.description:
* Analysed current state of IT Project Management reporting
* Designed OLAP data warehouse for business intelligence reporting
* Built SSIS ETL procedures using Kimball techniques
* Implement automated and on-demand reporting using SSRS
* Provide training to developers and users
* Documented all work done for full-time team
…
see more

positions.title: MTS Allstream
positions.description:
* Reduced rebates on SLA accounts through development of more than 50 BI reports using SQL Server, VB.NET and MS Excel
* Reduced report delivery time up to 20% by creating BI-specific .NET tools and Visual Studio add-ons
* Improved collaboration and project tracking by lobbying for and Implementing source code revision control using Subversion
* Shaved 5 days off month-end processing by automating manual tasks using PowerShell and SQL Server Agent
* Cut up to 50% off run-time of existing SQL stored procedures

given.text: Gerald is highly skilled in development of .NET and Sql server solutions. He would be a fine addition to any team.
Gerald is always quick in problem solving and he always has a bright and surprising idea in doing it in a better way.

Gerald is a solid worker, and during the time I worked with him, he demonstrated solid knowledge of managing and generation of reporting data for the executives of the company. Good grasp of data organization and report generation skills. Would recommend Gerald for any job where data organization and reporting were involved.

Gerald is a refined and very efficient developer. Having built a vast and valuable experience, he’s constantly updating and honing his skills to the latest technologies and methodologies. His solid track of proven accomplishments attests his ability to add value to any endeavor he undertakes

received.text: Dila is an outstanding business leader, quick on the uptake, never hesitating to take on new roles and challenges.  Working with Dila was pleasure. She is a team member who encourages her fellow team mates to excel while challenging herself to continually grow and expand her own impressive skill set.

I have the pleasure of working with Jordan on 2 different contracts. Jordan was both very responsive to my requirements and in fulfilling the requirements of the clients. He is extremely knowledgeable as an IT recruiter, understands current technology and current specialties, and is highly skilled at matching candidate to position.

items: Why is my CTE so slow?
How to see the schema of a result set before running a query
How to check if a date is a holiday in SQL server
Using APPLY to make your queries DRYer
